product.product_title: Cockroach Killer Gel Bait Includes (1 Tube +1 Plunger +1 Tip) Multicolour 30g
product.long_description: Let's get rid of wide varieties of cockroaches with these active 1 Pcs Advion Syngenta Cockroach Gel Bait 1. Best for indoors and outdoors, you can easily use this cockroach killing product in the food handling areas. With its non-repellent, toxic and potent active ingredients, you can kill not only German and American cockroaches but also the brown-banded, Australian, oriental cockroaches. This Advion Syngenta gel bait kills not only nymphs and adults but also the eggs of cockroaches, You can use this product around your pets without any worries but be careful around the kids. Due to the unique formulation of this 2 Pcs Advion, Syngenta Cockroach Gel Bait can kill cockroaches effectively for 2 years after opening.
feature_bullets: Indoxacarb 0.6%

Dupont Advion cockroach gel bait can be used in single and multi-family residential buildings, schools, commercial and industrial facilities (warehouses, apartments, supermarkets, restaurants, motels, hotels, hospitals, food handling/storage establishments) and transportation equipment such as aircraft, trains, ships, boats, cars, buses
Treatment rates for all uses
High-consumption bait features a non-repellent formulation
Labeled for both indoor and outdoor use and Can be used on commercial, residential and industrial sites

For heavy infestations of cockroaches, apply 3 to 5 spots of Advion cockroach gel bait per 10 linear feet for light to moderate infestations of cockroaches, apply 1-3 spots of Advion cockroach gel bait per 10 linear feet each spot of Advion gel bait should equal about; 5 grams (approx. 1/4″ diameter

is light can adjust the intensity of two levels of light through the button switch at the bottom. The light color is warm light, the color temperature is 3000K, and the light is very soft.

product.long_description: Made from high quality materials to minimise wear and tear from prolonged use. Helps improve the sense of imagination and creative play alongwith role play. Perfect for children as they have attractive colours and cute designs. Catch them all with this 144 pieces set of Pokemon figures and win every Pokemon match against your friends. Pokemon action characters have been entertaining the world since their launch in 1996. As a result, Pokemon has become a popular game-based franchise. Pokemon attractive designs and adventurous characters make them great playtime companions for children. Kids will enjoy with the toys. The Toys are wonderful to play with boys gang as game or fight. Pokemon action toys and figures come in sets as well as individual figures. A set of figures can make a great gift for Pokemon fans. You can find many individual figures with movable parts and made from durable PVC material. The action figures can help kids to develop imaginative ability by becoming creative while playing with them.

product.product_title: 3-Seater Exquisitely Floarl Designed Wrinkle-free Anti-slip 360-degree Full Coverage Sofa Slipcover Beige/Blue Length Stretch From 190 To 230cm
product.long_description: A sofa cover, often called a slipcover, is a piece of fabric draped over or tucked into a sofa for protection or decoration. Add a no-sew cover to your couch for an inexpensive and quick solution; buy a slipcover for an easy-to-install, instant-upgrade for your sofa. Give your sofa a new luxurious look with this sofa cover that's very easy to install. Exquisitely detailed and beautifully designed, this sofa cover brings an artful grandeur to the scene. Revamp a tired sofa or add color and style to your living space! Whether you have sofa loving dogs, small children, or an eye for interior design, a sofa cover ensures your sofa looks great and remains in perfect condition. So, give your sofa a break and let our covers do the work, whilst you relax in style! The elastic fit is easy, relaxed and fits perfectly with all standard sofas. Slip this cover on your sofa to hide stains and wear n tear, add a new color scheme to your living room or protect your sofa from children or pets. Made from a blend of polyester and spandex fabric, this cover gives you long-lasting durability and easy maintenance. This sofa cover is very strong and durable, making it ideal for daily use. A simple machine wash in cold water and gentle cycle keeps this cover looking clean and fresh. This increase and enhance the glamour and beauty of your living room.
feature_bullets: Highly elastic material: Soft and stretchy fabric that provides perfect coverage to your sofas. This sofa cover is perfect to cover your sofa fairly, to give a wrinkle-free look with perfect effect. The non-slip foam items are provided to be placed in the wrinkles of the seat cushion so that the cover stays in place providing a clean look with a soft and comfortable touch. Naturally dyed with no color shading or fading

Multipurpose protection: Suitable for most types of sofas. Perfect stitching, 360-degree full coverage. Refresh any home decor. This universal stretch sofa cover provides total protection for your sofas, keeping your furniture away from stains, pet hair, dirt, claws, wear and tear and other damage. It is ideal for families with children, cats and dogs or for anyone looking for an economical solution to protect their furniture
Freshen up your home decor: Covers with a variety of exquisite designs and colors adds elegance to your home décor and instantly brightens up your old furniture. Suitable for standard 1-seater sofa

Easy installation: Very easy to install due to its highly elastic elastane fabric. Machine washable in cold water. Wash separately on gentle cycle with mild detergent. Do not use whitener. Note: the color of the products displayed may be slightly different from the actual product due to different photographic devices and vision effects
Universal size sofa cover suitable for most types of sofas

product.product_title: Superhero Spiderman Breathable Comfortable Themed Party Fancy Dress Cosplay Costume S
product.long_description:
Put a smile on your kid's cute face and give them a superhero experience with this Halloween cosplay spiderman costume. It is made of polyester material which is stretchable, soft and comfortable to wear. The mask is made of air-permeable fabric so that you can breathe comfortably. This includes masks, tops and pants that provide a convenient fitting for your kids.
This spiderman dress will be the perfect gift for your kids for birthday parties, role-playing, halloween, stage cosplay performances, kids day out and daily activities.

Polyester - good quality material 
This spiderman costume is made of polyester material, which is stretchable, soft and comfortable to wear. The mask is made of air-permeable fabric so you can breathe comfortably

full costume design
Spiderman dress mask, teamed with top and pants that cover the entire body from neck to toe. This suit is a one piece for the toes and goes all the way like a glove to the hand

easy to wear
This dress is fully stitched and ready to wear. Its good quality stretchability makes it easy to wear inside or outside. It provides convenient and comfortable fitting for your kids

Fine Printing with Bright Colors
Make your kid stand out with this spiderman costume as it comes with elegant spider crafting with stunning prints and long lasting bright colors

Choose your right size
This spiderman dress for kids provides a comfortable fit and comes in three different sizes according to age as follows
Small size - 2 to 4 year olds Medium - 4 to 6 year olds Large size - 6 to 8 year olds
You can also check the size chart for a completely comfortable fit for your baby

Cleaning Tips! you must know
This spiderman kids costume is washable with hot water.
It provides a perfect balance to keep your outfit clean and safe. You can also use a mild detergent to wash polyester fabric. Machine wash with hot water is also possible
feature_bullets: Perfect design: deejay superhero costume covers the entire body from neck to toe. this includes a mask, top and pants which provides a convenient fitting for your kids. compatible with superhero cosplay costumes, make you livid like a character in halloween party

A perfect gift for your child: deejay spiderman costume would be a perfect gift for your kids in birthday party, role-play, halloween, stage cosplay performance, children's day and daily activities. your child will be mesmerized and happy after seeing this costume

Comes in one perfect size: the spiderman costume for kids provides a comfortable fit and comes in three different sizes depending on the age, where the small size is suitable for 2-4 year olds, the medium size is 4-6 year old suitable for children of 6-8 years of age and the larger size is suitable for children aged 6-8 years. please also refer to the size chart given in the figure.

marketplace: Free shipping is applicable on noon express orders over 100 AED. 10 AED shipping fee will be applied at checkout when the order value is less than 100 AED.

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.

marketplace: Free shipping is applicable on noon express orders over 100 AED. 10 AED shipping fee will be applied at checkout when the order value is less than 100 AED.

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.

product.product_title: Electric Breast Pump With Feeding Bottle and 100% BPA Free Medical-grade Material
product.long_description: This single breast pump is comfortable, effective, and quiet, suitable for use in offices, homes, and traveling. With massage mode and soft massage cushion, makes mommy comfortable and helps stimulate breast milk flow. Provide fresh milk for your baby every day. Operation Instruction- Press the on/off button to start up and shut down. Press the mode button to switch to massage mode and suction mode. Massage Mode- The red light is on. Once the milk flows, press the "+" button or adjust to suction mode. Suction Mode- The blue light is on. Press ""+"" or ""-"" button to adjust suction strength. Silicone petal milk pad, effective prevention of spring back, massage mammary areola, which helps to stimulate breast milk secretion. Very quiet, easy to wash and carry, super massage and suction. Built with 100% BPA-free medical-grade material, the inner valve has an anti-backflow design. Feeding a baby becomes terribly easy. Compact, lightweight design that is easy to store and transport. Made of good quality material that is safe for baby to use. Colour Name- Pink/White. Product size- 19.2x8.7x21 cm. Detail Product List- 1 x Electric Breast Pump Set.
feature_bullets: Silicone petal milk pad, effective prevention of spring back, massage mammary areola, which helps to stimulate breast milk secretion

product.product_title: The Subtle Art Of Not Giving A F*ck Paperback English by Harper Editor Team - 19/01/2017
feature_bullets: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a Fuck has taken the world by storm, selling almost 2 million copies in its first year alone
Book your mom dreams about when she makes a bubble bath at night
Subtle Art presents an entirely new approach to personal development, from top to bottom
Life is not about getting rid of problems, it’s about finding better problems
Knowing everything, but becoming more comfortable in not knowing anything

specifications.name: About the Author
specifications.value: Mark Manson is a star blogger who is read by over two million people each month. He lives in Europe and South America, but spends significant time each year in the United States, most often in New York City. The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F**k is his first book.

specifications.name: Book Description
specifications.value: The Subtle Art Of Not Giving A F * Ck: A Counterintuitive Approach To Living A Good Life

specifications.name: Editorial Review
specifications.value: “Resilience, happiness and freedom come from knowing what to care about--and most importantly, what not to care about. This is a masterful, philosophical and practical book that will give readers the wisdom to be able to do just that.” (Ryan Holiday, New York Times bestselling author of The Obstacle is the Way and Ego is the Enemy) “Mark’s ability to dig deep and offer amazing, yet counter-intuitive, insight into the challenges of life makes him one of my favorite writers, and this book is his best work yet.” (Matt Kepnes, New York Times bestselling author of Travel the World on $50 a Day: Travel Cheaper, Longer, Smarter)

product.product_title: Rich Dad Poor Dad: 20th Anniversary Edition - Paperback English by Robert T. Kiyosaki
feature_bullets: April 2017 marks 20 years since Robert Kiyosaki’s Rich Dad Poor Dad first made waves in the Personal Finance aren
In many ways, the messages of Rich Dad Poor Dad, messages that were criticized and challenged two decades ago, are more meaningful, relevant and important today
As always, readers can expect that Robert will be candid, insightful… and continue to rock more than a few boats in his retrospectiv
Explodes the myth that you need to earn a high income to become rich
Shows parents why they can’t rely on the school system to teach their kids about money

specifications.name: About the Author
specifications.value: Best known as the author of Rich Dad Poor Dad—the #1 personal finance book of all time—Robert Kiyosaki has challenged and changed the way tens of millions of people around the world think about money. He is an entrepreneur, educator, and investor who believes that each of us has the power to makes changes in our lives, take control of our financial future, and live the rich life we deserve.

specifications.name: Book Description
specifications.value: 2017 marks 20 years since Robert Kiyosaki's Rich Dad Poor Dad first made waves in the Personal Finance arena. It has since become the #1 Personal Finance book of all time... translated into dozens of languages and sold around the world. Rich Dad Poor Dad is Robert's story of growing up with two dads - his real father and the father of his best friend, his rich dad - and the ways in which both men shaped his thoughts about money and investing. The book explodes the myth that you need to earn a high income to be rich and explains the difference between working for money and having your money work for you.20 Years... 20/20 Hindsight In the 20th Anniversary Edition of this classic, Robert offers an update on what we've seen over the past 20 years related to money, investing, and the global economy. Sidebars throughout the book will take readers "fast forward" - from 1997 to today - as Robert assesses how the principles taught by his rich dad have stood the test of time. In many ways, the messages of Rich Dad Poor Dad, messages that were criticized and challenged two decades ago, are more meaningful, relevant and important today than they were 20 years ago. As always, readers can expect that Robert will be candid, insightful... and continue to rock more than a few boats in his retrospective.

product.product_title: 3 Colour Nail Extension Gel Kit Contain 100 Piece Crystal Nail Molds Multicolour
feature_bullets: All-in-one Nail Art Set: It contains 3 of POLY extension gel +100 pieces of crystal nail mold +manicure brush +Double-headed Manicure Tool+ Nail File Strip+UV LED Nail Lamp， you can make a variety of beautiful extended nails and other nail designs.This nail extension gel is mainly composed of natural resin, organic and odorless. It is soft and easy to use, you can paint on it as you like.

Easy to Use: It is very simple and easy to operate. Even beginners can complete beautiful nail extensions in minutes. Not only suitable for professional nail technicians, but also suitable for beginners to do their own nail art at home.

Fast Drying: Our nail extension glue dries very quickly. The curing time of general LED lamps is 60-90s, and the curing time of ultraviolet lamps is 2-3 minutes. This extension gel is strong, flexible and easy to control. (Note: The time required depends on the thickness of the gel.)
Different Nail Types: Suitable for all kinds of nails. Has a good gloss and strength.

Product Description:
Package: 15ml Extension gel*3;Nail brush*1; Double-headed Manicure Tool *1;Model Nail Tips*100 ，Nail File Strip*1，UV LED Nail Lamp*1
Weight：200g

How to use：
1. Clean the nails, then trim the nail surface according to the normal manicure steps.
2. Apply a layer of primer and cure under the illumination (curing for 30 seconds).
3. Take out the crystal nail mold, and evenly spread the extension gel on the nail mold with a nail brush.
4. Gently attach the nail mold to the nail and cure under illumination.
5. Build nail molds and build into your favorite shape.

product.product_title: Clothes Organizer And Holder Metal Stand White 110*54*150(132)cm
product.long_description:
Modern Style for Wide Range of Use: The garment rack of great practicality brings much more convenience to your daily life. You can display your clothes in the bedroom, to help yourself to decide everyday outfit more conveniently, rather than store them in the cabinet again and again.

2 in 1 Design for Ample Space: Perfect rack to organize your everyday outfits or to arrange your seasonal closet. There are two long enough hanging rods that give you the ability to keep all your clothes organized, in the case of being scattered all around the room. In order to maximize space utilization, it adopts one wide bottom storage shelve, allowing you to store shoes, bags, hats and more. The living surrounding is neater, life is happier.

Sturdy Metal Structure for Lasting Durability: Characterized by a solid metal structure, the cloth rack shows perfect performance in sturdiness as well as load-bearing capacity. of evenly distributed weight. The powder-coated surface makes it not easy to rust, and thus enables longer service time. Meanwhile, its rounded tube causes no harm to your cloth.

Simple Assembly & Easy Maintenance: It is not difficult to find how to put all parts together within minutes, even alone since the rack features an ultra-simple design. Daily maintenance requires less effort, and what you need to do is just wipe the dust off with a soft cloth, super easy clean-up.
feature_bullets:
Large storage space
Sturdy and durable
Easy to assemble
A variety of uses
Proficiently anchored to offer a higher level of functionality and efficiency
Hard wearing and well build construction prevents it from getting damaged

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.

marketplace: Free shipping is applicable on noon express orders over 100 AED. 10 AED shipping fee will be applied at checkout when the order value is less than 100 AED.

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.

marketplace: Free shipping is applicable on noon express orders over 100 AED. 10 AED shipping fee will be applied at checkout when the order value is less than 100 AED.

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.

It's good for early education. Great gift, cactus plush toys are the best holiday and birthday gifts for children. Adults can also decompress. marketplace: Free shipping is applicable on noon express orders over 100 AED. 10 AED shipping fee will be applied at checkout when the order value is less than 100 AED.

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.

product.product_title: Cordless Electric High Pressure Washer Multicolour 9meter
product.long_description: 2X MORE PRESSURE -- The 24V Cordless Portable Washer delivers up to 30Bar(435psi) of pressure, 4L/Min Rated water flow, it is 2 times more pressure than a garden hose with a nozzle, and much more portable and convenient to take the power cleaner anywhere. POWER 24V LITTHIUM BATTERY WASHER -- Lightweight and compact pressure washer gun with a 24V powerful lithium battery, long battery life, plug and play, allow you to use it anywhere without wire winding. DRAWS WATER FROM ANYWHERE -- Come with a 5M long garden hose allow you to draw water from any fresh water source like a pool, lake, or bucket and . You can hook up to a garden hose at the house or even a 2L bottle on the go. RICH PRESSURE NOZZLE -- Come with a 0°nozzle for long and powerful rinse or garden watering, and a 40°nozzle for wide range car suface washing, quick and effortless car cleaning. EASY TO USE -- Package include a foam pot for conenient washing. A filtration box for hose with high efficiency and deep filtration, deep double filtration of impurities in water, long service life of protection pump.

marketplace: Free shipping is applicable on noon express orders over 100 AED. 10 AED shipping fee will be applied at checkout when the order value is less than 100 AED.

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.

product.product_title: High-Quality, Portable And Foldable Castle Tent House For Toddlers, Pink 105x105x135cm
product.long_description: Do you want to give your kid a big surprise? This Portable Folding Pink Play Tent Children Kids Castle Cubby Play House is what you are seeking for. This big and colorful tent will make your kid exciting. The spacious tent allows the kid to play inside freely. Your kid will love this amazing and colorful world created by the tent. It is easy to install, fold and clean for your daily use without occupying much space. It is made of professional-grade material, so you can feel free to buy it for your little kid. Specifications: 1. Material: 170T Polyester Fabrics 2. Frame Material: Fiber Rod 3. Color: Pink 4. Weight: 35.27oz / 1000g 5. Dimensions: (41.33 x 41.33 x 53.15)" / (105.00 x 105.00 x 135.00)cm (L x W x H) Package Includes: 1 x Kids Play Tent 1 x Zippered Storage Bag. Made of soft fabric and breathable mesh design allows for a safe and environmental friendly playhouse for the kids, tent door can be positioned wherever you need, simply tie the curtain back to create the door. Kids can crawl in and out easily .Fairly easy to install with support poles, then knot the ends of the elastic inside the poles.  The kids play tent provides perfect space for your child to play dress-up, have fun with friends, or read. And also inspire children's imaginations while giving them a private space of their own. Castle Tent is light weight and is easy to construct and deconstruct without tools required in just minutes. When playtime is over, the castle can be disassembled quickly for easy storage and travel.
feature_bullets: With high-quality and eco-friendly materials, it is attractive, breathable and non-irritating
It is safe, reliable and easy to fold. easy to clean, you just need to gently wipe dirt with a damp cloth
The curtain can be rolled up, which extends the play space. high-density and anti-mosquito gauze can prevent kids from mosquito bites
Light and compact, it is easy to carry after being folded without occupying much space
It provides personal space for your kid and is an ideal companion while going travel with kid

specifications.name: What's In The Box

marketplace: Free shipping is applicable on noon express orders over 100 AED. 10 AED shipping fee will be applied at checkout when the order value is less than 100 AED.

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.

product.product_title: Electric Balloon Pump Durable Sturdy Made Up With High Quality Lightweight 21x14x17cm
product.long_description: This amazing electric balloon air pump makes inflating balloons so easy & fun, this balloon pump is best suitable for events and festive parties where large quantities of balloons can be inflated within minutes with only minimum effort. Decorating any place with balloons becomes hassle free and helps save a lot of time as compared to when done manually. This balloon pump is lightweight, extremely durable and portable , making it easy to carry it around to any place where balloon decoration is required such as parties, festive celebrations, promotional activities etc. This Electric Balloon Air Pump Inflator has Advanced Wire storage (when not use, you can store the wire to avoid to be damaged) and Automatic protection device, when the pump unattended too long time, the pump will automatically disconnect the power supply
feature_bullets: Inflate balloons quickly under high pressure
Lightweight design, it can be conveniently taken along with for birthday, wedding or any other celebration occasions to fly the colorful balloons
Controls motor temperature by using the high speed air stream so as to maintain motor under working temperature for longtime usage

It's special nozzle makes operation much easier. It start when you press down the nozzle and stop immediately when releasing, if large number of balloons need inflating, you may turn on the button for continuous use
With patented special cooling system for motor, support continuous use for long time

marketplace: Free shipping is applicable on noon express orders over 100 AED. 10 AED shipping fee will be applied at checkout when the order value is less than 100 AED.

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.

marketplace: Free shipping is applicable on noon express orders over 100 AED. 10 AED shipping fee will be applied at checkout when the order value is less than 100 AED.

Up to 10 AED shipping fee will be applied per seller on all market items. This per-seller fee will depend on the order subtotal from each seller as follows: AED 10 if seller subtotal is less than AED 100; AED 5 if the seller subtotal is between AED 100 and AED 500; and AED 0 if the seller subtotal is greater than AED 500. This fee applies even if your order includes both noon express & market items.
Shipping fee will be applied on bulky items.
